ca.teamTen.recitopia
Class ApplicationManager

java.lang.Object
  ca.teamTen.recitopia.ApplicationManager

public class ApplicationManager
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton class for managing shared/heavy resources. This class manages user identification. Eventually, all recipe books will be instantiated/managed by this class.
